scripts.test: npm run contracts:lint && npm run test:api && npm run test:sdk-python
scripts.test:api: python -m pip install -r services/dashboard-api/requirements.txt && python -m pip install -r services/dashboard-api/requirements-dev.txt && PYTHONPATH=services/dashboard-api python -m pytest -q services/dashboard-api/tests
scripts.migrate: cd services/dashboard-api && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt && alembic upgrade head
scripts.contracts:lint: python -m pip install -r requirements-dev.txt && npx --yes @redocly/cli@latest lint contracts/openapi/control-plane.v1.yaml && python scripts/validate_json_schemas.py
scripts.web:dev: npm --prefix apps/web install && npm --prefix apps/web run dev
scripts.web:build: npm --prefix apps/web install && npm --prefix apps/web run build
scripts.test:sdk-python: python -m pip install -r sdk/python/requirements.txt && python -m pip install -r sdk/python/requirements-dev.txt && PYTHONPATH=sdk/python python -m pytest -q sdk/python/tests
